title.value: Injury and violence in the context of sustainable development
title.justification: It is the primary focus of the paper as indicated by the title.
title.quote: Injury and violence in the context of sustainable development

extractions.description: The paper comprises a collection of abstracts from the 2024 Bethune Round Table conference, focusing on global surgery and challenges related to injury and violence, particularly in low- and middle-income countries.

type.justification: The document primarily contains theoretical discussions and reviews related to global surgical practices.
type.quote: This collection of abstracts, focusing mainly on the theme “Injury and Violence in the Context of Sustainable Development,” reflects the diverse range of topics discussed during the conference.

name.justification: The central theme revolves around global surgery practices and innovations.
name.quote: The Bethune Round Table (BRT) is an annual interdisciplinary meeting dedicated to the field of global surgery to discuss challenges and solutions to improving surgical care.

name.justification: Many of the abstracts focus on injury prevention methods and strategies.
name.quote: The selected abstracts, representing the top contributions, highlight the critical challenges faced by underprivileged populations and the innovative approaches proposed to enhance surgical care accessibility and quality.

name.justification: A significant part of the conference discusses trauma, its prehospital care, and management in low-resource settings.
name.quote: The data collected can lead into intervention plans or programs aimed at reducing the burden of injuries.
